title: DeFi for Cardano - Learning Portal
description: Devs and Entrepreneurs do not have a comprehensive understanding of the Cardano DeFi space and require the training and education to scale

title: Oracle for CPI data
description:
Mandatory for mass adoption of DeFi is CPI data on blockchain

Long term contracts like:

rental, lending, insurance need yearly price adopt

title: Indigo: Synthetic Assets on Cardano
description: Cardano's DeFi ecosystem will require a scalable Plutus smart contract protocol to efficiently & securely bring real world assets on-chain.

title: Fantasy Bidding with Staked Funds
description: Fans of certain NFT can't bid and win alone. Whales can dominate. Auctions happen all over but not by type. Fans need a 'place' to buy!

title: Fund unlimited social microlending
description: Microlending apps struggle to secure debt funding to lend out to their underbanked users as the financial system has tough entry barriers.

title: Cardano Offline Developer's Kit
description: How do we increase the adoption of  Cardano's Blockchain  for DeFi Project Development in Internet-challenged regions?

title: Wise Rabbit- Livestock Investment
description: Farmers & citizens suffer from a lack of liquidity & investment due to an unstable, inflationary currency, resulting in poor food security.

title: Ensuro: A Decentralized Insurance
description: Insurance is hardly present where most needed, as in developing countries, and is unavailable as an investment product for ordinary people.

title: Maladex: Algorithmic Swaps Protocol
description: Proposed Cardano DEX models are inefficient: have low capital efficiency, high impermanent loss, and are prone to struggle with concurrency.

title: Maladex: Cardano Index Funds
description: Investors with the multitude of Cardano projects to choose from are unable to invest in all of them and control the risks involved.

title: Influence Quality Price & Image
description: 1\. Which of the product quality, price and brand image have a dominant influence on consumers' decision to buy Cardano Coin (ADA)?

title: Milkomeda Oracle
description: Solidity developers who want to deploy an oracle on an EVM sidechain need a way to expose their sidechain oracle to the Cardano mainnet

title: DeFi Bounty System
description: No freelance platform exists where a worker can be compensated in ADA for tasks, projects, or on a salary basis.

title: Algorand - Cardano DeFi bridge
description: There is a need for bigger blockchain interoperability

title: Minswap DEX Security Audit
description: The security of Cardano DeFi smart contracts, which will hold billions of dollars, is unknown. Plutus eUTXO contract design is  untested

title: Mosaic: DeFi Functionality for NFTs
description: It is exceedingly difficult to price, monetize and leverage expensive NFTs. There is no service offering adequate options for NFT collectors

title: Community Oracle (free) Price Feeds
description: All projects need off-chain data feeds. These feeds are expensive and may prevent projects without adequate funding/support to launch.

title: Tools for auto and home loans
description: Given the high variety in loan provisions throughout US states, how can we create standardized templates to work across jurisdictions?

title: Liquid Labor - Freelancer Contracts
description: The rapid transition to platform based products and services is creating additional layers of complexity at the detriment of the user.

title: Pharo ACM
description: DeFi/Crypto/Catalyst/Cardano is not mainstream and it is difficult to onboard new people into the crypto markets.

title: Panther - Private Layer 2 Protocol
description: To create an interchain DEX that bridges Cardano to DeFi with interoperability, institutional support, and KYC / AML compliant privacy.

title: AdaSwap - The next-gen DEX!
description: Cardano is not known yet as a DeFi player, not enough celebrities, media and coverage care about Cardano at the moment.

title: Decentralized Sous Sous Savings
description: Developing good savings habits when in an economically disadvantaged position is hard. The habit is hard to develop, but valuable to learn.
